metadata.Title: CVE-2014-9799 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: The makefile in the Qualcomm components in Android before 2016-07-05 onNexus 5 and 7 (2013) devices omits the -fno-strict-overflow option to gcc,which might allow attackers to gain privileges via a crafted applicationthat leverages incorrect compiler optimization of an integer-overflowprotection mechanism, aka Android internal bug 28821731 and Qualcomminternal bug CR691916.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
